php.LBL_REGISTRATION_OFFLINE_DESC: Ak chcete zaregistrovať systém, ktorý nemá prístup na internet, pošlite e-mail na adresu %s spolu s údajmi subjektu.
php.LBL_REGISTRATION_OFFLINE_EXAMPLE:
Predmet: YetiForce offline registration

Správa:
CRM registration / Registrácia CRM:
Company name or first and last name / Názov spoločnosti alebo meno a priezvisko: %s
Country / Krajina: %s
City / Mesto: %s
The number of employees of the company / Počet zamestnancov spoločnosti: %s
Your company's website / Webová stránka vašej spoločnosti: %s
Product key / Produktový kľúč: %s
APP ID: %s
Version / Verzia: %s
php.LBL_REGISTRATION_COMPANY_DETAILS_VARY: Company details vary, re-registration is required.
php.LBL_EMAIL_INFO: Vaše prístupové údaje zašleme na túto e-mailovú adresu
php.LBL_SUCCESSFUL_TRANSACTION: Thank you for making the payment. The transaction is being processed, purchased functions will be added to your system once we receive the payment.
php.LBL_FAILED_TRANSACTION: Transaction failed or was cancelled, please check the payment on your PayPal account and try again.
php.LBL_SIZE_OF_YOUR_COMPANY_HAS_CHANGED: The size of your company has changed, the purchased package is too small for the current size. Update your subscription.
php.LBL_SUBSCRIPTION_HAS_EXPIRED: Predplatné exspirovalo. Prosím predĺžte predplatne ak chcete ďalej využívať túto funkcionalitu.
php.LBL_YETIFORCE_SHOP_PRODUCT_CANCELED: Jeden zo zakúpených produktov exspiroval alebo požaduje zmenu balíka. Produkt bol dočasne zrušený.
php.LBL_PAID_FUNCTIONALITY_ACTIVATED: Platená funkcionalita bola aktivovaná bez zakúpenia predplatného!!!
php.LBL_SUBSCRIPTION_COMPANY_SIZE_HAS_CHANGE: Veľkosť spoločnosti sa zmenila a požaduje vyššiu úroveň predplatného balíka
php.LBL_SHOP_INVOICE_DETAILS: Invoice data extracted from company data
php.LBL_SHOP_INVOICE_DETAILS_DESC: Modification of entered data triggers data update in the system
php.LBL_SHOP_NO_COMPANIES_ALERT: There is no data of the target user (the company that owns the CRM) in the system. The data is required to issue an invoice, it is not possible to make a payment without this data.
php.LBL_SHOP_INSTALLINCLOUD_DESC: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Qui tempora nemo repellat tenetur libero nihil enim porro nesciunt laboriosam vel. Repudiandae, sit reprehenderit deserunt hic eius porro dolores vitae numquam!
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDONATIONS_INTRO: Help us create the best open system in the world and invest in your future!
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDONATIONS_DESC:
YetiForce has been installed by 40,000+ companies in over 100 countries, it is completely free and our company develops it together with customers and thanks to paid add-ons. The system is equipped with over 150 free functionalities, which you can adjust and modify.

We want the system to develop dynamically, so support our project with any amount per month (even with 1 Euro). All collected funds will be used for support tickets on GitHub (https://github.com/YetiForceCompany/YetiForceCRM/issues) and to create new functionalities, which will be available for free in the system.

The YetiForce system has always been and will remain free of charge, but it depends on you how it will continue to develop and whether it will be able to compete with the largest systems in the world. What we have already produced results from our passion and desire to create a unique system that is accessible to everyone.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEHELP_INTRO: Základná podpora pre systémových administrátorov [email, video, dokumnetácia]
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEHELP_DESC:
YetiForce is a very powerful system, it provides 80+ user modules, 80+ configuration panels, 30+ tools, and understanding them all requires time and extensive experience. By purchasing basic support, you gain access to the knowledge and experience of the YetiForce team that develops the system. Support is provided in English and Polish.
- Email support for users
- Email support for admins

Support via email applies only to basic issues. If your company requires support regarding advanced system capabilities, e.g. creating new modules, process automation - or the system has been modified by a developer, we recommend purchasing the YetiForce Development package.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDISABLEBRANDING_INTRO: Nahraďte YetiForce značku za svoju vlastnú
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDISABLEBRANDING_DESC:
Prispôsobte si značku YetiForce CRM zmenou údajov zobrazených v systéme. Do vygenerovaných dokumentov pridajte podstatné informácie, do pätičky zadajte firemné údaje alebo si nastavte vlastné odkazy na profily na sociálnych sieťach.

Zakázať značku YetiForce vám umožňuje odstrániť odkazy na profily sociálnych médií YetiForce z päty systému a nahradiť ich odkazmi na profily sociálnych médií vašej spoločnosti. To vám umožní prispôsobiť vzhľad systému YetiForce tak, aby používatelia aplikácie nevideli v päte nadbytočné informácie. Okrem toho zakážete aj pätu výrobcu vo všetkých e-mailoch odosielaných systémom a PDF tlačových výstupov generovaných systémom.

Poznámka: Tento doplnok nezakáže všetky odkazy na značku YetiForce, ktoré sa nachádzajú v systéme. Prejdite na Marketplace na našej oficiálnej webovej stránke a dozviete sa viac.
php.LBL_SHOP_INTEGRATOR_INTRO: Offer the YetiForce system to your clients and gain exclusive perks available only to YetiForce Integrator partners.
php.LBL_SHOP_INTEGRATOR_DESC:
REQUIREMENTS 

 1. Correct registration of all YetiForce installations used by the Partner and the Partner’s clients. 
 2. Owning a GitHub account and active participation in the YetiForce repository. 

 BENEFITS 

 1. Direct support (chat, e-mail, GitHub) from the YetiForce team in terms of advanced problems related to system operation, API and configuration. Support can be provided in Polish or English. Support may also be provided to the Partner’s customers in cases when the Partner will not be able to help its customers. 
 2. The possibility of hiring YetiForce’s employees for large implementations (service available for an additional charge, provided remotely, communication in Polish and English). 
 3. The opportunity to cooperate in tenders (shared customer testimonials, a common list of specialists, support in price estimates). 
 4. Ability to use the “YetiForce Integrator” logo on the Internet. 
 5. Promotion in the partnership catalog on the official website and in the YetiForce system. 
 6. 10% discount on all products offered in the marketplace by the YetiForce producer and other Partners (also for Partner’s own customers). The possibility of booking a project - the discount might be 20% but it will be granted to a Partner which books the project as first. 
 7. The impact on the direction of system development and new functionalities. 

  COST 

 1. The monthly participation fee for the YetiForce Integrator partnership is 250 €.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDEVELOPMENTSUPPORT_INT: Advanced system support and development [chat, email, phone]
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDEVELOPMENTSUPPORT_DES:
Advanced system support allows comprehensive support not only for administrators but it also includes customization and adding new functionalities to the system. All work is coordinated by experienced developers who contribute to the system. Support is provided in English and Polish. YetiForce development package includes:
- Email support for users (free)
- Email support for admins (free)
- Solving technical and system errors (subtracted from package hours)
- Adding new functionalities to the system (subtracted from package hours)
- System updates (subtracted from package hours)
- Training (subtracted from package hours)

Each email with description is analyzed and the number of hours is estimated. If the quote is accepted, the task is scheduled.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEINSTALLINCLOUD_DESC:
We will install the system on the most efficient infrastructure that meets the expectations of the most demanding customers. We will take care of safety, performance and solve any infrastructure problem for your convenience. Each user will receive from a few to several GB for corporate data, and the database will be placed on high-performance Intel Optane drives. In addition to the production version, we will configure the testing version of the system and you will receive full access to the application backups. 
 Note: We work from Monday to Friday 8am-4pm (CEST) and need one working day to process your order.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEINSTALLINHOSTING_DESC:
We will prepare professional hosting that complies with the producer's infrastructure and perfectly meets the restrictive requirements of the system. We will take care of safety, performance and solve any infrastructure problem for your convenience. Each user will receive from a few to several GB for corporate data, and the database will be placed on high-performance SSDs. In addition to the production version, we will configure the testing version of the system and you will receive full access to the application backups. 
 Note: We work from Monday to Friday 8am-4pm (CEST) and need one working day to process your order.
php.LBL_SHOP_INFORMATION: The prices of the products and services below vary depending on the size of the company. The size of the company is determined by the number of system users. The application will automatically adjust the prices to the size of the company each month, according to the following criteria: Micro company (up to 20 users), Small company (up to 50 users), Medium company (up to 250 users), Large company (up to 1000 users), Corporation (over 1000 users).
php.LBL_SHOP_RESELLER_INTRO: Sell YetiForce’s products and services, earn money on promoting YetiForce in your country.
php.LBL_SHOP_RESELLER_DESC:
REQUIREMENTS 

 1. Providing initial support for customers who were offered YetiForce’s products and services. 
  2. Owning a GitHub account and active participation in the YetiForce repository. 
  3. Correct registration of all YetiForce installations used by the Partner and the Partner’s clients. 

 BENEFITS 

 1. Direct support (chat, e-mail, GitHub) from the YetiForce team in terms of solving simple problems related to the operation and configuration of the system. Support can be provided in Polish or English. 
 2. Ability to use the “YetiForce Reseller” logo on the Internet. 
 3. Promotion in the partnership catalog on the official website and in the YetiForce system. 
 4. 10% discount on all services and products offered by YetiForce (also for reseller’s customers). 
 5. An impact on the direction of system development and new functionalities. 

  COST 

 1. The monthly participation fee for the YetiForce Reseller partnership is 100 €.
php.LBL_SHOP_MODULEPRODUCER_INTRO: Offer your modules and functionalities to YetiForce’s community all over the world in the official store.
php.LBL_SHOP_MODULEPRODUCER_DESC:
REQUIREMENTS 

 1. Creating modules that comply with current technology standards as well as with the system’s architecture. 
  2. Owning a GitHub account and active participation in the YetiForce repository. 
  3. A Partner has to update their modules and provide support on GitHub on a regular basis. 
 4. Correct registration of all YetiForce installations used by the Partner and the Partner’s clients. 

 BENEFITS 

 1. Direct support (chat, e-mail, GitHub) from the YetiForce team in terms of solving simple problems related to operation and configuration of the system. Support can be provided in Polish or English. 
 2. Ability to use the “YetiForce Module Producer” logo on the Internet. 
 3. Promotion in the partnership catalog on the official website and in the YetiForce system. 
 4. 10% discount on all products offered in the marketplace by the YetiForce producer and other Partners (also for Partner’s own customers). 
 5. An impact on the direction of system development and new functionalities. 
 6. Audits of quality and compliance with standards for Partner’s modules. 
 7. Security audits for Partner’s modules. 

  COST 

 1. The monthly participation fee for the YetiForce Module Producer partnership is 100 €.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEGEOCODER_INTRO: Integrate with a modern map for address search
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEGEOCODER_DESC:
YetiForce Address Search is our proprietary solution that allows you to search for a postal address located anywhere in the world as well as postal addresses for major public administration institutions. This addon is based on the OpenStreetMap (OSM) engine that is run in our hyper-efficient cloud. This integration increases the efficiency of the functionality, significantly improves security in relation to public OSM servers, and provides cost-saving in comparison to using the popular Google Maps service.

The functionality can be used in every module which requires entering address data, e.g. in 'Leads', 'Accounts', 'Contacts', 'Quotes' or 'Sales invoices'.

NOTE! We care about the confidentiality and security of your company's sensitive data. Any data entered by users (employees) into the YetiForce CRM system is not saved or sent to YetiForce Sp. z o.o., which is a software producer.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEMAP_INTRO: Integrate with a modern map for data visualization, route mapping and address search
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEMAP_DESC:
YetiForce has launched its own, incredibly efficient and secure map servers that are based on the Open Street Maps engine. The add-on enables:

- Direct visualization of Companies and Contacts added to YetiForce CRM.
- Routes calculation between Companies and Contacts existing in the system.
- Searching address data of Companies added to the system.

The main advantages of the YetiForce Map solution are increased security (in comparison to public servers), saving a significant amount of money (in comparison to Google Maps), and high efficiency due to the use of cutting edge server technology.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEPASSWORD_INTRO: Real-time verification of user passwords against data breaches
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEPASSWORD_DESC:
YetiForce spustil server s viac ako 572 miliónmi hesiel, ktoré unikli v dôsledku hackerských útokov na databázy po celom svete. Používanie tohto rozšírenia vám umožní overovať heslá v reálnom čase (pri vytváraní používateľov, zmene hesiel, prihlasovaní do systému) a upozorní vás, ak bolo aktuálne používané heslo prezradené a malo by sa okamžite zmeniť.

Medzi vaším systémom a naším serverom sa vymieňajú iba hodnoty hash hesiel (SHA1). Neuchovávame žiadne informácie o systéme, používateľovi ani prihlásení; okrem toho nezaznamenávame IP adresu, ktorá odoslala požiadavku, ktorá obsahuje hash hesla.

Majte na pamäti, že používanie viacfaktorového overenia (MFA), ako aj umožnenie prístupu iba cez dôveryhodné adresy IP alebo šifrované siete VPN tiež výrazne zvýši bezpečnosť vášho systému.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEOUTLOOK_INTRO: Integrate YetiForceCRM with your Microsoft Outlook email client
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEOUTLOOK_DESC:
Je to moderný doplnok pre Microsoft Outlook. Umožňuje vám načítať CRM systém priamo v okne Outlook, kde si môžete stiahnuť a priradiť e-mail k údajom v systéme. Integrácia navyše umožňuje vykonávať z pohľadu e-mailu rovnaké operácie ako v štandardnom systéme, t.j.

- Pridať spoločnosti a kontakty (účty, kontakty, potenciálni zákazníci, predajcovia, partneri, konkurencia)
- Pridať procesy a podprocesy (Príležitosti, Dohody, SLA, Kampane, Cenové ponuky, Predajné objednávky, Tikety atď.)
- Pridať poznámky, udalosti, dokumenty
- Pracovať priamo z e-mailového klienta, čo vám umožňuje optimalizovať proces obsluhy zákazníkov a uľahčuje vykonávanie mnohých činností z jedného miesta.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEMAGENTO_INTRO: Integrate the YetiForce CRM system with the Marento e-commerce platform
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEMAGENTO_DESC:
YetiForce integrated with Magento, one of the largest and most popular e-commerce platforms. This solution allows you to conduct centralized activities related to customer service and e-store orders straight from the CRM. It means that you will be able to communicate with clients, create all necessary documents related to orders (eg. invoices, receipts, storage documents) and update stocks - all in one place.

Your employees won’t have to learn how to use the complex Magento platform if you integrate your CRM with this extension, which will result in lower training costs.

Data synchronisation between the two systems takes place using the API (Magento Admin REST endpoints). Flexible design of the solution allows multi store management, i.e integration of YetiForce with multiple stores based on the Magento engine. It also allows one central warehouse or multiple warehouses where each store has its warehouse. Regardless of stores number, YetiForce is always the master system that centralizes data from the Magento platform. The communication is one-way, i.e YetiForce CRM queries the Magento API downloading and updating data in both ways.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEPLGUS_INTRO: Get all the company information straight from the polish Central Statistical Office
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEPLGUS_DESC:
Tento modul šetrí čas vašich zamestnancov. Manuálne vyhľadávanie a overovanie údajov už nebude potrebné, rovnako ako zadávanie údajov do príslušných polí v zázname - systém vyhľadá a vyplní príslušné polia. Na získanie všetkých potrebných informácií o danej spoločnosti a ich jednoduché uloženie do systému vám stačí jedno z nasledujúcich čísel: IČ DPH, NCR, alebo NOBR.

Všetky údaje sa sťahujú v reálnom čase priamo z poľského centrálneho štatistického úradu pomocou API (https://api.stat.gov.pl/Home/RegonApi), takže sú spoľahlivé a aktuálne.

Zoznamy polí vyplnených automaticky v jednotlivých moduloch:

– Účty / Accounts: IČ-DPH, NCR, DIČ, názov účtu, právna forma, štát, kraj, obec, mesto/dedina, PSČ, ulica, číslo budovy, číslo kancelárie, krajina, hlavný telefón, fax, hlavný e-mail, web
– Potenciálni zákazníci / Leads: IČ-DPH, NCR, DIČ, meno potenciálneho zákazníka, právna forma, štát, kraj, obec, mesto/dedina, PSČ, ulica, číslo budovy, hlavný telefón, fax, hlavný e-mail, webová lokalita
- Predajcovia / Vendors: Meno predajcu, NOBR, štát, kraj, obec, mesto/dedina, PSČ, ulica, číslo budovy, číslo kancelárie
- Súťaž: Názov, štát, kraj, obec, mesto/obec, PSČ, ulica, číslo budovy

Upozornenie: Rozšírenie YetiForce GUS môže vyhľadávať iba spoločnosti registrované v Poľsku.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEWIDGETS_INTRO: It is a set of widgets that will allow additional information to be displayed on the dashboard and in the record summary.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEWIDGETS_DESC:
It is a set of widgets that will allow you to display additional information on the dashboard and in the record summary, so that all the necessary details will be available to the user at his fingertips.

1. PDF Preview

It is a widget that allows you to preview a system generated PDF document straight from the record summary view. Thanks to this widget you will be able to preview an invoice or any other PDF document directly from the record, without having to save it on your hard drive. This solution will significantly facilitate the work of users responsible for issuing and sending PDF documents, and the accounting department employees who won’t have to download all invoices in order to view them.

2. Updates

It is a widget that allows you to view the history of user activity. It will let you review all activities that have been performed on records in the system in a given period of time by all users. The widget contains numerous advanced filters that will help you search for individual activities. e.g.
- searching by the user who made the changes
- searching by the owner of the record where the changes were made
- filtering by time interval
- filtering by activity type
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEWEBSERVICEPREMIUM_INTR: Rozšírená verzia štandardného API dostupného v YetiForce CRM zadarmo. Doplnok bol vytvorený hlavne s ohľadom na platformu YetiForce Portal.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEWEBSERVICEPREMIUM_DESC:
YetiForce Webservice Premium je rozšírená verzia štandardného API dostupného v YetiForce CRM zadarmo. Doplnok bol vytvorený hlavne s ohľadom na platformu YetiForce Portal, dá sa však použiť na rôzne účely v závislosti od potrieb vašej spoločnosti.

Premium Webservice sa od štandardnej verzie líši počtom podporovaných metód - okrem základných metód podporuje aj nasledovné:

Základný modul:
- Získať údaje miniaplikácií z hlavného panela
- Získať hierarchiu záznamov
- Vygenerovať a stiahnúť súbor PDF zo šablóny
- Získať zoznam šablón PDF
- Získať údaje o záznamoch zo zdrojov
- Získať zoznam miniaplikácií
- Funkcionalita obchodu - vytvárať záznam v rozšírenom module (objednávky)

Základný modul
- Testovacia metóda pre zákaznícky portál
- Získať menu pre zákaznícky portál

Produkty:
- Získať podrobnosti o produkte
- Funkcia obchodu - získať zoznam produktov pre objednávky

Používatelia:
- Zmeniť preferencie používateľa

Doplnok YetiForce Webservice Premium je povinný pre správne fungovanie portálu YetiForce.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEVULNERABILITIES_INTRO: Skener zraniteľností sa používa na monitorovanie, či aktuálne používané aplikácie na serveri a externé knižnice používané v CRM obsahujú verejne známe zraniteľnosti.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEVULNERABILITIES_DESC:
YetiForce Vulnerabilities sa používa na sledovanie toho, či aktuálne používané aplikácie na serveri a externé knižnice používané v CRM obsahujú verejne známe zraniteľnosti.
Skener zraniteľností zisťuje verzie použitých knižníc alebo nástrojov a kontroluje v globálnej databáze CVE, či existujú nejaké známe zraniteľnosti verzie, ktorú sme nainštalovali.

Skener kontroluje:

- externé knižnice používané v CRM (knižnice napísané v PHP)
- zraniteľnosti pre použitú verziu PHP
- zraniteľnosti webového servera (apache, nginx)
- zraniteľné miesta pre knižnice na serveri: OpenSSL
- zraniteľnosti pre SQL engine (MySql, MariaDB)
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERBL_INTRO: The YetiForce RBL addon allows you to integrate the internal RBL database with the public RBL database.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERBL_DESC:
YetiForce RBL (Remote Block List) používa verejnú databázu (https://soc.yetiforce.com/) nebezpečných IP adries, ktoré boli identifikované ako zodpovedné za odosielanie spamu.

Vďaka tejto funkcionalite budete môcť mať aktuálnu databázu nebezpečných serverov, ktoré posielajú nebezpečné alebo nechcené emaily.

Použitie riešenia tohto typu pomôže imunizovať zamestnancov vašej spoločnosti proti stále rastúcemu počtu rôznych hackerských útokov, phishingu, podvodov a útokov sociálneho inžinierstva.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDAV_INTRO: YetiForce DAV allows for two-way synchronization of contacts, calendar and tasks between different devices by using CardDAV and CalDAV protocols.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDAV_DESC:
YetiForce DAV consists of two functionalities:
- CalDAV - enables two-way synchronization of activities (tasks, calls, meetings) saved in the calendar between YetiForce CRM and any mobile device or other tool supporting the DAV standard.
- CardDAV - enables two-way synchronization of contacts between YetiForce CRM and any mobile device or other tool supporting the DAV standard.

Both solutions create a new calendar / address book next to our old ones where we can add new entries. All added entries will be sent to CRM.
Thanks to this solution, we can always have an up-to-date calendar or contact book on the phone or other device.
The list of applications can be found in our documentation: https://doc.yetiforce.com/apps/#DAV
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEKANBAN_INTRO: The Kanban board will facilitate your work and speed up the handling of processes
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEKANBAN_DESC:
The Kanban board is a tool used mainly for project management, but in YetiForce CRM this view is available in all user modules where data is stored. Kanban helps to visualize data by grouping them in various ways, effectively define the amount of work in progress and increase efficiency.

Boards in the Kanban view use cards and columns that can be easily configured in the panel according to the needs of your company. Moreover, in the YetiForce CRM system, you can create multiple tables for one module that will present the data grouped in various ways.

Benefits of using the Kanban board:
- The use of this solution will help to improve communication between all team members and departments of the company, which will increase the efficiency and productivity of the team.
- Workflow visualization will influence the optimization of the company's business processes and will help find potentially problematic areas, such as bottlenecks.
- Boards works for any user module that contains data
- Data presentation method can be customized for each board
- Supported field types: Picklists, Assigned to
- Option to display summary of numerical and currency fields
- Supports colors and icons for value fields
- Supports quick edition
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEAUTOASSIGNMENT_INTRO: The mechanism allows you to define the rules for automatically assigning an owner to created records or changing the current owner.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEAUTOASSIGNMENT_DESC:
YetiForce Auto Assignment significantly improves the efficiency of your team's work. The mechanism will automatically assign tasks to a user or a group of users,eg. inquiries sent via a contact form or tickets, on the basis of strictly defined conditions.
The mechanism can estimate the workload of employees in real time and assign new tasks to these employees who are able to take care of them at the moment. All the conditions can be customized using an intuitive panel in the system settings to match the profile of your company.
php.LBL_ACTIVATE_DEACTIVATE_SERVICE_CONFIRM_: Are you sure you want to activate/deactivate service?
